definition: Liwan district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong

sentences.english: I worked in the office of Bureau of Agriculture and Water Conservancy at Liwan.
sentences.chinese: 我是在荔灣區農業水利局的辦公室裏工作。

sentences.english: Most of the Dawus are located in Liwan District.
sentences.chinese: 大多的大屋主要分佈在荔灣區。

sentences.english: Liwan District of Guangzhou City Community Sports Service to investigate the status quo analysis.
sentences.chinese: 對廣州市荔灣區社區體育服務現狀進行調查分析。

sentences.english: The "Star Light Elderly Home" of Fengyuan Street, Liwan District, is a fine example of all the elderly homes in the city.
sentences.chinese: 其中，荔灣區逢源街星光老年之傢俱有示範作用。
